import React,{useEffect} from 'react'; import OwlCarousel from 'react-owl-carousel'; import '../OwlCarousel2-2.3.4/dist/assets/owl.carousel.css'; import '../OwlCarousel2-2.3.4/dist/assets/owl.theme.default.css' import Cart from './Cart'; import CourseService from '../Services/courseService'; import { FETCH_COURSES } from '../Store/Action/type' import reduxAction from '../Store/Action/action' const courseService = new CourseService() function MyCourse() { useEffect(() => { courseService.layDanhSachKhoaHoc().then(res => { props.dispatch(reduxAction(FETCH_COURSES, res.data)); }).catch(err => { console.log(err); }) }, []) return (

) } export default MyCourse
